name: GraphQL.Engine

unions.name: Argument
unions.comment:
We can also accept:

  - Enum values (unquoted)
  - custom scalars

But we can define anything else in terms of these:

values.name: arg
values.comment: The encoded value and the name of the expected type for this argument
values.type: Json.Encode.Value -> String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Argument obj

values.name: argList
values.type: List.List (GraphQL.Engine.Argument obj) -> GraphQL.Engine.Argument input

values.name: batch
values.comment: Batch a number of selection sets together!
values.type: List.List (GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source (List.List data)

values.name: decodeNullable
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder data -> Json.Decode.Decoder (Maybe.Maybe data)

values.name: encodeArgument
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Argument obj -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: encodeInputObject
values.type: List.List ( String.String, GraphQL.Engine.Argument obj ) -> String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Argument input

values.name: encodeOptionals
values.type: List.List (GraphQL.Engine.Optional arg) -> List.List ( String.String, GraphQL.Engine.Argument arg )

values.name: enum
values.type: List.List ( String.String, item ) -> Json.Decode.Decoder item

values.name: field
values.type: String.String -> Json.Decode.Decoder data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data

values.name: fieldWith
values.type: List.List ( String.String, GraphQL.Engine.Argument arg ) -> String.String -> Json.Decode.Decoder data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data

values.name: list
values.comment: Used in generated code to handle maybes
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source (List.List data)

values.name: map
values.type: (a -> b) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source a -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source b

values.name: map2
values.type: (a -> b -> c) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source a -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source b -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source c

values.name: maybeEnum
values.type: List.List ( String.String, item ) -> Json.Decode.Decoder (Maybe.Maybe item)

values.name: maybeScalarEncode
values.type: (a -> Json.Encode.Value) -> Maybe.Maybe a -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: mutation
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection GraphQL.Engine.Mutation msg -> { name : Maybe.Maybe String.String, headers : List.List Http.Header, url : String.String, timeout : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, tracker : Maybe.Maybe String.String } -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Result.Result GraphQL.Engine.Error msg)

values.name: nullable
values.comment: Used in generated code to handle maybes
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source (Maybe.Maybe data)

values.name: object
values.type: String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection otherSource data

values.name: objectWith
values.type: List.List ( String.String, GraphQL.Engine.Argument arg ) -> String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection otherSource data

values.name: optional
values.comment: Encode the nullability in the argument itself.
values.type: String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Argument arg -> GraphQL.Engine.Optional arg

values.name: query
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection GraphQL.Engine.Query value -> { name : Maybe.Maybe String.String, headers : List.List Http.Header, url : String.String, timeout : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, tracker : Maybe.Maybe String.String } -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Result.Result GraphQL.Engine.Error value)

values.name: queryString
values.type: String.String -> Maybe.Maybe String.String -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> String.String

values.name: recover
values.type: recovered -> (data -> recovered) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source recovered

values.name: select
values.type: data -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data

values.name: union
values.type: List.List ( String.String, GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data ) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source data

values.name: unsafe
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection source selected -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection unsafe selected

values.name: with
values.type: GraphQL.Engine.Selection source a -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source (a -> b) -> GraphQL.Engine.Selection source b
